A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: 4.1/5\n\nI feel The Last Jedi exists in a tough spot in time\, as it doesnt truly hold as much hype as The Force Awakens\, neither does it stand strongly as the \"second one\" or the \"one after the meh Rogue One\"\, but even with its clear minor flaws regarding comedy and narrative choices\, particularly with a slow first half\, The Last Jedi still manages to express all the Star Wars energy it needs and more\, as it continues a story riddled with powerful and emotional moments\, as well as plenty of twists and shifts in dynamics that\, at least personally\, remind me of how awesome and significant the franchise is as a whole.
